DOC.detailed_description: Both group receive combination electrotherapy , deep friction massage stabilization exercise fifteen session . Combine group receive non surgical spinal decompression therapy ( NSDT ) different conventional physiotherapy group . Numeric Analog Scale , Straight leg raise ( SLR ) test , Oswestry Disability Index ( ODI ) apply baseline treatment . Disc height herniation thickness measure Magnetic Resonance Imagination ( MRI ) perform baseline three month therapy .
